import "./SingleProduct.scss"; import RelatedProducts from "./RelatedProducts/RelatedProducts" import { FaFacebookF, FaTwitter, FaInstagram, FaTelegram, FaPinterest, FaCartPlus } from "react-icons/fa" import prod from "../../assets/products/braclet-prod-2.jpg" const SingleProduct = () => { return (
name price disc
- 1 +
Category: Braclet Share:
) }; export default SingleProduct;
